data.message:
Hey eminem thank you for your beatiful lovely soul and such great music. I loved how you came so far with great might and never gave up. I live in Australia so i hope one day i will see you. My favourite music is all your music, thanks em your my inspiration in life and God loves you remember that! Good luck em your my idol and motivation, keep moving and fuck the haters bro, you more stronger than those dumb filthy pigs! Good luck and remember!... GO WITH GOD. Love you

By Luka Petrovski aka Constantine 🙏💪☝️❤

replies.message: Stan syndrome is strong with this one..
He raps about what sells dude, he could be the nicest person to ever walk the earth, you never know how someone feels on the inside.

Nv Hoppa that's not what Javi Martinez is saying or even meaning. No one is saying he isn't a nice guy etc.  But beautiful soul? Religious nuts are crazy AF to come away with that.
 His life with Kim and the song kinda shows that some of his songs are written through experience.

 He's still the rap God!!
